description: ## Overview Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Use of a Cryptographically Weak Pseudo-Random Number Generator (PRNG). An attacker can predict the output of random number generation, which may lead to the compromise of cryptographic operations. ## Remediation There is no fixed version for `tianocore/edk2`. ## References - [Additional Information](https://blog.quarkslab.com/pixiefail-nine-vulnerabilities-in-tianocores-edk-ii-ipv6-network-stack.html) - [RedHat Bugzilla Bug](https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2258706)
remediation: There is no fixed version for tianocore/edk2 .
title: Use of a Cryptographically Weak Pseudo-Random Number Generator (PRNG)

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Use of a Cryptographically Weak Pseudo-Random Number Generator (PRNG). An attacker can predict the output of random number generation, which may lead to the compromise of cryptographic operations.
